Body: Our new tablet service provider, ICSolutions, is now forwarding both incoming and outgoing texts within an hour, on average. The longer you take to get your system in order, the more potential business your company is missing out on. I have prepaid message delivery credits that I would like to use and THEN I WILL purchase more. Please give me an update or give me a full refund. Thank you. I await your reply.
Still waiting to hear from you guys. I know you didn't get on my contact list for nothing. Tony Enid.

URGENT!!!!URGENT!!!!!!URGENT!!!! I'm that you refund my money or I'm reporting your company to the better business buruea and informing inmate shopper free bird publisher that this a scam business that capitalize on stealing from prisoners. I also will be filing a Federal Civil Lawsuit at the United States Central District Court if you refuse to refund my money.
They reduced the delay time on incoming and out going emails and pose to put the phones on the tablet next week let me know how fast u get this? I still need you and I tried calling you earlier.

hey ,I have a cell mate who want to have the services that you provide. I had lost your brochure so I wasnt able to promote your product all the way correctly. also he wanted to use your search engine to find his love one's his name and info is kennent bouldin #k73041 and send him your information as well as setup a corrlinks email service with him so you can talk to him.
my people over at ABservices have you guys made any progress as of yet ???? and did you happen to locate my photes looking forward to any response respectfully your friend Leo

I've been very patient and asked politely for my money back and got no response.I asked you for pictures last November and never got them.I am now in a new facility and you said you were printing out pictures and sending them back in march and never sent them.I had to buy those pictures through another company and no longer new them from you.now it like you just took my money.I'm asking you again for my $45 to be refunded to me.I only asked for pictures nothing else.the relays I paid for and sent messages don't even get relayed for months now.if you don't refund my money I have no choice but to report you to the better business bureau an the FBI for fraud and running a scheme.an I promise I will have my family pursue this issue.the non July 25 you sent me the same message you sent to a Joseph which shows you're running a scheme.
